lore: Skorpekh Lords have fallen far from their noble beginnings, allowing an obsession with slaughter to twist their bodies and minds. Lurching forward on tripod bodies, their enmitic annihilators blast victims messily apart as their claws and blades lash out to reap a crimson harvest across the battlefield.

otherAbilities.United In Destruction:: While this model is leading a unit, melee weapons equipped by models in that unit have the [LETHAL HITS] ability.
otherAbilities.Crimson Harvest:: Each time this model ends a Charge move , select one enemy unit within Engagement Range of this model and roll one D6: on a 2-5, that unit suffers D3 mortal wounds ; on a 6, that unit suffers D3+3 mortal wounds.
